snippet.title: Vietcong Trailer (2003)
snippet.description:
Vietcong is a tactical first-person shooter computer game, developed by Pterodon and Illusion Softworks, published by Gathering in April 2003, and set during the Vietnam War.
The sequel to Vietcong, Vietcong 2, was released in late October 2005.

-------------------------------------------

Infos:
Developer: Pterodon & Illusion Softworks 
Distributor:  Gathering of Developers 
Engine: Ptero-Engine II 
Release date:  April 2003 (Windows) 
Genre: Tactical first-person shooter 
Mode: Singleplayer, Multiplayer 
Platform: PC (Windows)

Song: PseudoHendrix by Rude Kostry. Thanks to DeluxeHobo for the information.
